text: Ezɨ God, Krais ko porogha en faragha zuima, e an gɨn ghua kalabuziar gumazamizibar mɨn ghua bar akuegha mɨgɨa ghaze, Krais modorozim gafiragha apaniba dɨkabɨragha gɨfa! Ezɨ arazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar God gɨfoghamin fofozim ini. A mati mughuriar aghuimɨn mɨn otozɨ, amɨnim a bɨrazɨ a tintinibar ghu. Bizir kam bagha kɨ God mɨnabi.2:14 Grighɨn akar otevitam kagh deragha mɨkemezir puvatɨ.
